name: Revenge of the dead
description:
A game where you kills skeletons it has 3 classes of players , some variation in skeletons and an arena mode and normal mode

CAUTION!!!

(so normal mode is kinda broken so yeah :) i seem to have fed up basically everything neat)

Controls

W,A,S,D for movement

right click for special

left click for normal attack
